title: Stahování zpráv do "Místní složky"
content: Dobrý večer, mám dva poštovní účty. Na minulém PC mi šlo nastavit v Thunderbirdu stahování zpráv z obou účtů rovnou do "Místní složka", do "Doručená pošta". Postup nastavení byl následující: Nástroje - Nastavení účtu - Nastavení serveru - Úložiště zpráv, a tam byla ikona "Rozšířené", kde byl nějaký výběr a jedna z možností byla Místní složky. Po spuštění TB zmizely v levé části oba účty a zůstala tam jen Místní složky. Po instalaci stejné verze TB na nový PC ikona "Rozšířené" zmizela. Může mi, prosím, někdo poradit, jak to nastavit zpět (pokud to jde). Děkuji
creator: leosve

title: install1300 series psc 2400 photo smart
content: Trying to get my HP PSC all in one printer installed in Levono windows 10. How about lending a hand.
creator: groverslocum771

title: Thunderbird layout - classic view - message pane portion is too small, message list area is too large
content: Thunderbird layout - how do i enlarge the classic view current message pane window? it's too short/compressed, and i can only drag it up a little, then it stops. In the prior TB versions, I only saw the last 3 or 4 messages in the upper message list portion of the classic view layout. Now I'm seeing almost 10 messages in my messages list. Meanwhile, the actual current message viewing pane is now horizontally compressed so that the ratio of message list to message view is closer to 40% message list, 60% actual message text plus the header info. I have tried click and drag the upper border of the current message being viewed, towards the top of the screen, but it stops, and still shows me 10 most recent messages in my list, which is really useless. I only need to see the last 3 or 4. The rest of the viewing pane should be more of the text area of the current message being viewed. Is there a "config editor" tweak to reduce the messages list to 3 or 4 messages, and increase the actual current message viewing area? Or some other fix for this?
creator: MrSensible

title: Sync Outlook iCloud calendar with Thunderbird
content: Problem: I'm 76 years old and technically self-taught. I have 2 Windows 11 computers. One desktop and one laptop. Both are fully updated and utilizing Office software, specifically Outlook. Not too long ago I happily discovered Thunderbird and like it soooo much better. QUESTION: Within Outlook, my calendar is displayed as iCloud Calendar which is ok for me. The one thing that is keeping me from exclusively using Thunderbird is not being able to import my iCoud calendar into Thunderbird. Is that even possible and if so, how? Please keep your response as simplistic as possible. Thank you for your time and consideration given to my inquiry.
creator: truckdriverdon

title: All Gmail folders are not showing up for 2 accounts
content: Hi, I've switched to Thunderbird from Outlook, and so far so good. However there's one thing I'm not sure how to resolve, and hoping someone can tell me how to fix it. I have 4 Gmail accounts configured in TB, and they all work perfectly fine. For 2 of them, I see all folders from Gmail, including Spam, Trash, Unread, etc., however in the first 2 that I had added I only see the standard 4: Inbox, Sent, Outbox and Trash. How do I make sure all folders (including Spam) are shown for the first 2 accounts? Thank you.
